lead_paragraph: Kirby Freeman was named Miami’s starting quarterback, beating out Kyle Wright in a scrutinized competition. Hurricanes Coach Randy Shannon would not say how Freeman separated himself in the race, only insisting that “Kirby gives us the best opportunity to win games.” Miami opens Saturday at home against Marshall.
